Your blood sugar reading above is not accurate. Many pharmacies will check your blood sugar for free. Just make sure to fast 10-12 hours before the ckeck, or eat a "normal" meal and have it checked 2 hours later.Never rely on one BP check. Some pharmacies will check your BP for free also.

question: hello well to start off im happy because i can get online help, im 18 and my family is runing with diabetes,heart problems, cholesterol, high bp. Well i often excersise, but ever since i started college, last friday, i havent had time to work out. Well i was absent 4 days but i dont like to be absent. Anyway today my mom checked my blood pressure and it was 137 68 and my blood sugar was 117, i did alot today i Went swimming for 30 minutes, walked alot, Went to the gym for an hour and a half. I mean cmon how can this be happening to me, im 18 years old. Im afraid, is it normal for this to happen?
